about_the_game:
Leviathan is a multiplayer extraction shooter set in a sci-fi universe where humanity has been abducted by a gargantuan, interstellar beast and changed over the course of several millennia. Ultimately, the abducted were deposited to new planets and evolved into three factions of ideologically distinct lifeforms. A short time ago, a second set of abduction events occurred – but now... fate has brought them together to the surface of the bountiful world of Domusalus... where only ONE FACTION will remain.

Fight for control of Domusalus as one of these factions:

• Terran – Strength is paramount, and a chance to demonstrate their might to the weaker factions will surely ensure dominance. Furthermore, Domusalus is rich in resources of which their home planet is greatly lacking. After living in such hostile environments, the Terran have no intentions of sharing – and the other factions are simply in the way.

• Faunian – They believe in the preservation of all life… but should any being show disregard to this most sacred ideal, they will work to destroy the aberration at all costs. In seeing the other factions taking advantage of the planet’s resources, the Faunian look quickly to protect it, even if it means total destruction of the opposition.

• Angel – With their golden metallic bodies, the Angel have all but discarded their humanity. In doing so, however, they have become virtually immortal and look to transform all other lifeforms in the same way. Believing that this is the only way for advancement, any who resist are looked at as lesser beings that require immediate extermination.

Key Features

• Three playable factions – each with a mysterious shared history!

• Hundreds of items - weapons, ammo, armor, grenades, restoratives and more!

• Explore the “Aurelian Wilds” - a HUGE map offering unique areas, enemies, loot and extractions!

• High risk/High reward - fight against (and loot!) both AI and Player opponents!

• Play solo or in teams of three – take the loot for yourself OR work together to enhance survivability!

• Capture outposts – make your mark to boost your faction's domination over the planet!

short_description: Play as one of 3 factions as they fight for control of Domusalus. But beware of the Kaecillian menace as they threaten both the locals and the invading factions. Deploy with your gear, search for loot and escape in time to keep it.
